text: Fecal Matter was a short lived punk rock band from Aberdeen, Washington. The band was made in 1985 by Kurt Cobain, the future lead guitarist of the band Nirvana, and Dale Crover. The band made a demo tape named Illiteracy Will Prevail. That demo tape was unofficially released in 1985. == Members == * Kurt Cobain – vocals, guitar (1985–1986) * Dale Crover – bass guitar, drums (1985–1986) * Greg Hokanson – drums (1985) * Buzz Osborne – bass guitar (1986) * Mike Dillard – drums (1986) == References == Category:American rock bands Category:Musical groups from Washington (state) Category:American punk bands Category:1980s American music groups Category:1985 establishments in the United States Category:Musical groups established in 1985 Category:1980s establishments in Washington (state) Category:Musical groups disestablished in 1986 Category:1986 disestablishments in the United States Category:20th- century disestablishments in Washington (state)
title: Fecal Matter (band)
